title: The Dangerous years
creator_credit: William T. Cartwright and Bud Wiser
brief_description: Examines the juvenile crime dilemma facing society today. Through actual on-the-spot scenes, this film reveals the world of the juvenile offender and the often frustrated efforts of the police to stem the tide of juvenile crime.
description: Examines the juvenile crime dilemma facing society today. Through actual on-the-spot scenes, this film reveals the world of the juvenile offender and the often frustrated efforts of the police to stem the tide of juvenile crime.
